mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (username, password, age, gender, phone, medical_record) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalRecord,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_record = #{medicalRecord,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
